changelog.15.0.4-1:
* Fix a few regressions.
  * Fixed a bug that was preventing the creation of Windows menus.
  * Many changes to the demo process, including the addition of a 'register'
    icon
  * Added support for Debian's GNOME XDG menus.
  * Fixed a bug in the package uninstall when 'dpkg -r' is used.
  * Blacklist 'text/plain' so it does not get associated with PowerPoint.
  * Tweaked associations.

name: Crossover
description: Crossover is a tool to run Windows software and games in Linux. Common Windows programs have been built in, such as Microsoft Office series, Adobe Photoshop series, World of Warcraft and so on. Windows programs will be able to seamlessly integrate in your Linux systems through Crossover without Windows authorization, dual system and virtual machine.

changelog.15.0.4-1:
*修正了一些回归。
*修正了阻止Windows菜单的创建的错误。
*试用过程中许多变动，包括增加的“注册”图标
*增加了对Debian的GNOME XDG菜单支持。
*修正dpkg-r“时使用固定在包卸载的错误。
*调整黑名单'text / plain“，因此它不会与PowerPoint相关联。
*调整了关联。

zh_CN.description: Crossover是一款可以在Linux中运行Windows软件和游戏的工具。Crossover已经内置了常用的Windows程序，如Microsoft Office系列、Adobe Photoshop系列、魔兽世界等。使用Crossover，您不再需要Windows授权，不再需要双系统重启动，不再需要虚拟机，Windows程序就能与您的Linux系统无缝整合。
zh_CN.name: Crossover
